name: google-cloud-translate
label: Google Cloud Translate
description: Google Cloud translation technology to instantly translate texts into more than one hundred languages

fields.title: Service Account Private Key
fields.tooltip: Service Account Private Key file contents
fields.description: Contents of the service account private key file that is created for your account.A service account is an identity that Google Cloud can use to run API requests on your behalf.
fields.name: service_account_data

fields.title: Google Cloud Translate Project
fields.description: Number or ID of your Google Cloud Translate project that has the Cloud Translation API enabled and credentials to make authenticated calls.
fields.name: project_name

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Translate Text
operations.description: Translates text that you have specified using Google Cloud Translate based on input parameters you have specified. This operation returns the text that is translated to the language you have specified.

parameters.title: Input Text
parameters.description: Enter the text that you want to translate using Google Cloud Translate. To translate multiple phrases, you need to specify an array of strings. The maximum number of strings that you can specify is 128.
parameters.tooltip: The input text to translate. Provide an array of strings to translate multiple phrases. The maximum number of strings is 128.
parameters.name: input_text

parameters.title: Target
parameters.description: Choose the language to which you want to translate your input text. You can choose from options such as French, Dutch, Croatian, Chinese (Traditional), etc. Note: Use the "Get Languages" action to get a list of languages that are supported for translation byGoogle Cloud Translate
parameters.tooltip: The language to use for translation of the input text
parameters.name: target

parameters.title: Format
parameters.description: (Optional) Choose the format of the source text; i.e., eitherHTML Text(default) orPlain Text.
parameters.tooltip: The format of the source text, in either HTML (default) or plain-text.
parameters.name: format

parameters.title: Source
parameters.description: (Optional) Enter the language code of the source text. The language code that you specify here must be listed in 'Language Support'. Note:If you do not specify the source language, then the Google Cloud Translate API attempts to detect the source language automatically and returns it with the response.
parameters.tooltip: The language of the source text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support. If the source language is not specified, the API will attempt to detect the source language automatically and return it within the response.
parameters.name: source

parameters.title: Model
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the translation model you want to use to translate the specified text. Note: 'Cloud Translation - Basic' offers only the Neural Machine Translation (NMT) model. If you specify the model asbase, then the request is translated using the NMT model
parameters.tooltip: The translation model. Cloud Translation - Basic offers only the nmt Neural Machine Translation (NMT) model.If the model is base, the request is translated by using the NMT model
parameters.name: model

operations.title: Get Languages
operations.description: Returns a list of languages that are supported for translation byGoogle Cloud Translate.
